titleStmt.title: A sermon, tending to set forth the right vse of the disasters that befall our armies. Preached before the honourable houses of Parliament, at a fast specially set apart upon occasion of that which befell the army in the west. In Margarets Westminster, Sept. 12. Anno 1644. / By Matthew Newcomen, Minister of the Gospell at Dedham in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Newcomen, Matthew, 1610?-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Christopher Meredith at the Signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
